tick.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if a clock or watch ticks, it makes a short repeated sound
tick.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to mark a test, list of questions etc with a tick, in order to show that something is correct, to choose something etc
tick.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Tick the description that best fits you.
Just tick the box on your order form.
tick.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a mark (✓) written next to an answer, something on a list etc, to show that it is correct or has been dealt with
tick.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Put a tick in the box if you agree with this statement.
tick.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a very small animal like an insect that lives under the skin of other animals and sucks their blood
tick.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: the short repeated sound that a clock or watch makes every second
tick.translation[1].definitions[3].examp: I’ll be with you in a tick (=soon).
tick.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a mark that you put next to an answer to show that it is correct or against an item on a list to show that you have dealt with it
tick.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Put a tick in the column that applies to you.
tick.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: if you get something on tick, you arrange to take it now and pay for it later
tick.translation[2].definitions[2].defin: an occasion when the price of a share, bond etc moves up or down
tick.translation[2].definitions[2].examp: He had the trades done near the close of the trading day on either a plus tick (=a price higher than the previous trade) or a  zero-plus tick (=an unchanged price following upward price movement).
tick.translation[2].definitions[3].defin: in interest rates, bond prices etc one hundredth of one per cent
tick.translation[2].definitions[3].examp: The price of the December Eurodollar future quickly rose four ticks, from 94.15 to 94.19.
tick.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: to make a mark next to an answer or something on a list to show that it is correct or has been dealt with
tick.translation[3].definitions[0].examp: Which of the following features do you feel are important when choosing a bed? (Please tick all that apply).
